attributes.action: Close all manufacturing/construction for 4 weeks, stop spread of coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: To stop the spread of coronavirus variant.
attributes.background: 4 week shut down of all works.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all construction sites: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566846

Close all non-essential businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566706
